bibl.title: Letter from William Crawford Gorgas to Charles E. Magoon, June 30, 1905

div1.p: Gorgas requests the assignment of Raeder for duty as a nurse in the Canal Zone Sanitary Department.

div1.head: Letter from William Crawford Gorgas to Charles E. Magoon, June 30, 1905
div1.opener:
C. S. O., No 1667
June 30, 1905.
Governor of the Canal Zone,
Ancon, C.Z.
Sir:-
div1.p:
I have the honor to request that John M. Raeder, private first class,
Hospital Corps, U.S.A., now at Fort Myer, Virginia, be appointed as a nurse
at a salary of $50 gold per month. His training in the army hospitals has
especially qualified him for the services here.
div1.closer:
Very respectfully, (Sgd) W.C. Gorgas.
Chief Sanitary Officer. Copy sent to Maj. J.R. Kean.
